title: Studio, a ground floor "garden" apartment one block from Japantown
map_address: 1715 Webster Street Apt 105 near Bush and Sutter Sts
posting_body: A studio apartment in a great location just a block north of Japantown and one block east of Fillmore Street.
The apartment faces the rear of the building with a private brick patio and garden area.
The apartment has a small kitchen and a full bathroom as well as two closets.
The main open space studio area has a large open back bookshelf that divides the room into two living spaces -- the larger space is facing the patio and garden area with track lighting.
The smaller area was used as a bedroom.
This apartment is in a quiet building with quiet neighbors.
$2150 monthly rent with a one-year lease, then month to month thereafter.
Water and trash included in rent.
Security deposit of one month's rent is required with 1st month's rent upon signing lease.
Available for immediate move-in upon approval.
No open house -- just call or text to see the apartment.
The house manager will show you the apartment and building -- please call or text

A great location for all your needs within walking distance and so convenient ....  within a block or two to multiple bus lines (to downtown and cross-town), shops, several large grocery stores, drug stores, restaurants of every type, post office, movie theaters, clubs, ...
